subject: Create skill file `.claude/skills/lisa-learn/SKILL.md`
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Create the detailed skill implementation at `.claude/skills/lisa-learn/SKILL.md` following the 9-step workflow described in the plan. Pattern after `.claude/skills/lisa-review-project/SKILL.md` for structure and `.claude/skills/lisa-integration-test/SKILL.md` for validation/verification patterns.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] `.claude/skills/lisa-learn/SKILL.md` created with correct YAML frontmatter
- [ ] All 9 steps implemented: validate → manifest → diff → correlate → analyze → breakage detection → report → upstream → handle breakage
- [ ] Categories defined: Upstream Candidate, Potential Breakage, Safe Override, Neutral Change
- [ ] Pre-Lisa content retrieval via `git show HEAD:<path>` documented
- [ ] Important Notes section included
- [ ] NOT placed in `all/copy-overwrite/` (Lisa-only)

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coding-philosophy`, `/jsdoc-best-practices`

**Verification:**
- Type: manual-check
- Command: `wc -l .claude/skills/lisa-learn/SKILL.md && head -5 .claude/skills/lisa-learn/SKILL.md`
- Expected: File exists with 150+ lines, starts with `---` YAML frontmatter containing `name: lisa-learn`

verification.expected: File exists with 150+ lines, starts with --- YAML frontmatter containing name: lisa-learn
